Title: Egg dishes worth waking up for
Summary: Every October 10th, the world celebrates Egg Day, honouring one of nature’s most complete and versatile foods . A single egg packs nearly every essential nutrient the body needs, from high-quality protein and vitamin B12 to selenium and riboflavin .

Title: Ancelotti ready to make World Cup history with Brazil
Summary: No country has ever won the World Cup with a foreign-born coach . Carlo Ancelotti says there was "always a first time" as he eyes glory with Brazil .

Title: From Kano to couture: The Nigerian leather powering global luxury
Summary: Most Nigerian leather, often semi-finished, is exported to Europe and Asia and turned into luxury items bearing international brand labels . With her homegrown brand, Isi Omiyi creates high-end pieces to try to reclaim the leather .

Title: Hit-and-run driver kills activist Abiodun Aremu, burial set for Oct 23
Summary: The family of late activist Abiodun Aremu has rescheduled his burial for October 23 . They want to honour him with what they described as a proper farewell .

Title: Army launches probe as soldier kills wife, self in Niger
Summary: Lance Corporal Akinyele Femi, serving at 221 Battalion, Wawa Cantonment, Niger State, killed his wife and committed suicide on October 11 . Capt. Stephen Nwankwo, the soldier responsible for the suicide, said the incident occurred in Niger .

Title: UI suspends academic activities as ASUU joins nationwide warning strike
Summary: UI suspends academic activities as ASUU joins nationwide warning strike . Students, who had been notified ahead of the industrial action, stayed indoors .

Title: NLC grieves, demands probe into Abiodun Aremu’s death
Summary: Aremu was killed in a hit-and-run accident on Sunday, 12th October 2025, in his neighbourhood in Ifo, Ogun State . NLC grieves, demands probe into his death .

Title: Breaking: Renowned evangelist, Uma Ukpai, dies at 80
Summary: Ukpai’s ministry was non-denominational in nature . He led the Uma Ukpai Evangelistic Association, headquartered in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State .

Title: Netanyahu says he won’t attend Gaza summit in Egypt
Summary: Netanyahu was invited by US President Donald Trump to attend the conference in Egypt . Netanyahu says he won't attend Gaza summit in Egypt despite being invited by the US President .
